Fabio Inuy

Data analytics & Business Intelligence

About me

Let me tell some about me...

Data analyst professional with large experience in SAS and Oracle PL / SQL tools, managing a big data volumes (Big Data) and making reports, studies of customer profiles and opportunities to add value to the client and company in the sector of payments (credit cards and individual loans) at the first and largest retail bank in Brazil (Banco Itaú).
Additional experience in financial planning and control sector regarding financial model simulation, forecast and explanation of the results with financial dynamics and indicators.
In 2017, earned a M.S. in Data Science (MBIT School - Madrid) acquiring knowledge in other tools such as Python, RStudio, Mongodb, AzureML, Spark, Tableau, PowerBI and also in Machine Learning algorithm.

My Experiences

Previous associations...

2018

Cognodata,

Consultor Senior Data Analytics

Worked in a project with data analysis and ETL using SAS, MySQL, Talend for a Insurance Company.
Actually working in a project for a important Bank of Spain with data analysis using SAS.

2017

MBIT School

Data Scientist / Data Analytics

Worked on the final project of the Master in Data Science that consisted in the use of "People Analytics" to assist the Human Resources department to looking for new talents. We used Twitter as a data source and stored in MongoDB. The exploratory analysis and the application of machine learning were developed in Python, applying NLP to treat twitter texts and used SVM and Multinomial Naive Bayes algorithm to classify the twitter. And to finalize and visualize the results, we used Shinny.

2012

2014

Banco Itaú Unibanco

Manager Data Analytics in cost area

  • Managed a team with thirteen multidisciplinary employees with financial skills and data analytics skills (responsible for: direct and overhead costs; allocations of overhead costs; budget; forecasts; reports; adhoc analysis)
  • Created and automated a datamart with cost information for all areas of the Banco Itaú using SAS
  • Automated and optimized processes and queries
  • Created budget simulators with quantitative variables, rates, percentages to generate many financial costs scenarios, forecast monthly
  • Time series analysis of financial costs to understand the seasonality, unit costs and predict the future
  • Used descriptive statistics, analysis of quantitative and financial indicators to understand the information, guaranteeing their veracity and creating insights
  • Consolidated Financial Statements to prepare reports and presentations for board of directors
